story.title: Beneath Your Mask - Episode 6
story.storyDescription: An anonymous admirer is texting Heather at a costume party‚Ä¶

author.bio: Chris Marie Green writes hot contemporary romance (like ‚ÄúBedroomies‚Äù!) plus urban fantasy. She also loves devouring pop culture and avoiding international incidents while traveling.

story.prePaywallNotification: OMG‚ÄîNightwing just asked Heather to meet up! üòçüòç Will she take him up on the offer? Tap back into Hooked to find out.
story.postPaywallNotification: Did Heather‚Äôs last clue give away her identity? üçÉ Tap back into Hooked to see if Nightwing tracks her down.

messages.text: Heather lingers in the back of a geeky fandom bar where a cosplay meetup is going on.
She‚Äôs dressed like Poison Ivy ‚Äî with a red wig and viney mask.
Lights pulse in the dim club as yearning splits her down the middle, pounding mercilessly.
Are you here?
Yes. Are you wearing that super-hot Nightwing costume?
I rented it again just for you, Cap.
I‚Äôm not Captain-ette America tonight, darling.
You‚Äôre going to have to find out who I am.
Looks like the tables have been turned.
I like it.
Last time you laid a trail of wicked breadcrumbs for me.
But this time I‚Äôm lying some down for you‚Ä¶
And, if I know anything about you, you‚Äôre really going to like what you find‚Ä¶
Well, well. Who‚Äôs the cocky one tonight?
Before we start this up, I should tell you‚Ä¶
By the time I find you, I‚Äôm going to be really worked up.
I‚Äôm already halfway there just at the thought of hunting you down.
Oh‚Ä¶
God, I missed hearing you make those tiny, bothered sounds for me.
Soon I‚Äôm going to have you making a lot more of them‚Ä¶
Before her knees buckle, Heather leans back against a wall.
She can vaguely see Nightwing across the dim, throbbing room.
He stands heads and shoulders above everyone.
I guess this brings us to our first hint. Ready for it?
I think the question is‚Ä¶are you ready for ME?
#HotForYou
Awesome.
When you find me, I‚Äôm going to run MY fingers over YOUR skin this time‚Ä¶
Then I‚Äôll tangle them in your thick, sexy, dark hair.
She sees him tug his hand through his hair as if he‚Äôs hot and bothered.
As he scans the dance floor, she ducks into a dark hallway where she can keep an eye on him.
Are you trying to distract me by turning me on?
Or is there a hint about your identity somewhere in there?
Oh, Nightwing. Surely you‚Äôre used to villainesses who ruthlessly tease you.
And since I REALLY like to tease, here‚Äôs another hint‚Ä¶
I only dance when I hear a song that suits me. Maybe something from GREEN Day‚Ä¶
Before I start guessing, I want to be sure‚Ä¶
How familiar are you with Nightwing, villainess?
The two of us run in the same Gotham circles.
But now that I have the opportunity to stand back and watch ONLY you‚Ä¶
I‚Äôm all yours, lover.
‚ÄúYou know you can‚Äôt resist me. No man can‚Ä¶‚Äù
No shit.
Are you near the bar?
Maybe. Why don‚Äôt you take a good look while I confess my evil plans for you‚Ä¶
I want to peel off your costume.
I want to feel every inch of you under my palms.
I want to feel those muscles of yours pressing against me as I arch my hips against you‚Ä¶
I‚Äôm burning up with a chemical attraction that‚Äôs bubbling through me.
You‚Äôre burning ME up.
Hands clenched by his sides, he finishes inspecting the bar and starts moving in her direction.
The closer he gets, the more her belly knots up with a tight ache.
Jeez‚Ä¶I can‚Äôt WAIT for you to deflower me.
Whoa. Just to make sure‚Ä¶you‚Äôre not a‚Ä¶?
OMG, I AM NOT CARRYING A V-CARD!
It‚Äôs just another clue!!!
üòÖ
Okay, I‚Äôm pretty sure I know who you are, and I have to tell you‚Ä¶
GodDAMN. I‚Äôm throbbing already.
Then find me. I can ease the ache, lover.
I‚Äôve got all kinds of potions to give you sweet, permanent relief‚Ä¶
I‚Äôve always had a warped thing for Poison Ivy.
So when I do find you, you won‚Äôt have any chance of escaping.
Promise?
He‚Äôs ten feet away now, and she‚Äôs pounding between her legs, ready and so willing‚Ä¶
She steps out of the shadows just enough for his masked gaze to find her.
His eyes do a slow, erotic sweep of her.
With her pulse blasting, she retreats into the empty hallway.
He stalks toward her, and she holds back a desperate moan as he comes to tower over her.
She hooks her fingers into his utility belt and pulls him in so she can feel all of that hard body‚Ä¶
Lights pulse through the club as Heather makes him as happy as he made her the other night.
Then HE makes HER very happy‚Ä¶
Afterward, she smiles dizzily up at him while he caresses her face, almost as if he knows her‚Ä¶
He bends to grittily whisper in her ear.
A smile like that is a sure sign that you‚Äôre thinking about leaving here with me‚Ä¶
The comment sounds vaguely familiar‚Ä¶
But as he eases his fingers under her mask as if he‚Äôs about to take it off, panic throttles her.
She bolts, leaving behind a fantasy that just got way too real.
